Returns: true if we need the second level methods
retrieveReturn().Description: When retrieveReturn is true, we need to retrieve second level methods e.g., we need myView.getFirstLevelMethod().getSecondLevelMethod() we will set retrieveReturn = true on the annotation of myView.getFirstLevelMethod()

ClassDesc: This annotation can be used to mark fields and methods to be dumped when the view is captured. Methods with this annotation must have no arguments and must return a valid type of data.
